frameinstance.data-title: Welcome to the Cup of the Day
frameinstance.data-description: [{"TextFitLabelEnabled":true,"TextFontSize":2.5,"TextFont":"GameFontSemiBold","TextPrefix":"$t$i","TextValue":"Race for 15 minutes on today's track. You will be able to join the knockout phase afterwards and earn even more trophies.\nYou can see your global rank among all servers on the left of your screen.","TextSize":[130,30],"TextColor":[1,1,1]}]
